infoPlist.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: This app tracks a user in the background to give background notifications when a user is near a recommended location.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app will allow users to upload pictures from their library after having been to a location.
infoPlist.NSCalendarsFullAccessUsageDescription: This app will allow access to the calendar in order to create events related to the location.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app will allow users to take pictures and upload to site when user is at a location.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app needs to keep track of a user's location so that it can send timely notifications based on user's location and surrounding businesses.
infoPlist.NSSpeechRecognitionUsageDescription: This feature will be added to aid users who are unable to use tap and swipe features to add recommendations and navigate through the app.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app needs to keep track of a user's location so that it can send timely notifications based on user's location and surrounding businesses.
